name: Island Escape (Josh)
description:
This game is currently being developed. This version is in the early stages and I had to use some purchased art because I did not have enough time to make all my own. There will be more updates coming in the future, including, new worlds, new enemies, new sprites, new music, and much more. I look forward to building this project and keeping updates and listening to the feedback. 

This game can be played with an Xbox controller

Description:

You are a boy trapped on an island. If you fail to escape the island, you will be lost forever and become part of the island. The transformation will eventually take over the boy's body and turn him into the very creatures that he is fighting against to get off the island. 

Good Luck!
